methods.Name: Sin
methods.Description:
Sin returns the sine of the radian argument x.

Special cases are:
	Sin(±0) = ±0
	Sin(±Inf) = NaN
	Sin(NaN) = NaN

methods.Name: Cos
methods.Description:
Cos returns the cosine of the radian argument x.

Special cases are:
	Cos(±Inf) = NaN
	Cos(NaN) = NaN

methods.Name: ClampInt
methods.Description: Clamps a value between a minimum and maximum value.

methods.Name: ClampFloat
methods.Description: Clamps a value between a minimum and maximum value.
